heading: HB01407
0: AN ACT REGULATING THE SALE OF MOTOR VEHICLES IN METRO MANILA AND IN OTHER HIGHLY URBANIZED CITIES IN THE COUNTRY BY REQUIRING A PROOF-OF-PARKING SPACE OR FACILITY FROM MOTOR VEHICLE BUYERS AS A PRE-REQUISITE FOR THE PURCHASE OF A MOTOR VEHICLE AND REGISTRATION WITH THE LAND TRANSPORTATION OFFICE
